description:
I guess Sidney is down with his other buddies making gay porn, and was willing to try 'more.'
Order up one Serviced video.
While not willing to suck dick back, he did think he could do some stroking, which of course makes Ransom happy. Sidney scores extra points for not losing wood while doing it. Maybe it got harder?!
Sidney IS nervous during most of the video, but once he realizes he is not going to wilt, he generally gets into it, hardly paying much attention to the video playing for him.
Pretty sure he will be doing more work, though none has been filmed at the time of posting this. So it could be a looooong wait. (Seriously, it could be a while!)
So enjoy watching this twink-like boy get his nut off with Ransom!
title: Ransom & Sidney - Serviced
